welcome_message_body: Welcome to Banda Aceh, where the rich history and beautiful mosques await you. Enjoy the city's serene atmosphere and take the time to explore its unique charm.

restaurants.name: Mie Razali
restaurants.description: Mie Razali is a noodle restaurant located in Banda Aceh.
restaurants.address: Jl. T. Panglima Polem, Peunayong, Banda Aceh, Aceh

restaurants.name: Mie Kocok Ramai
restaurants.description: Mie Kocok Ramai is a noodle restaurant located in Banda Aceh.
restaurants.address: Jl. Teuku Umar, Banda Aceh, Aceh

restaurants.name: Warung Nasi Guri Pak Rasyid
restaurants.description: Warung Nasi Guri Pak Rasyid is a breakfast spot located in Banda Aceh.
restaurants.address: Depan Mesjid Raya (Tgk. Chik Ditiro), Banda Aceh, Aceh 23200

restaurants.name: Bakso Hendra Hendri
restaurants.description: Bakso Hendra Hendri is a indonesian meatball restaurant located in Banda Aceh.
restaurants.address: Jl. Mohd. Jam, Banda Aceh, Aceh

restaurants.name: Seafood Karibia
restaurants.description: Seafood Karibia is a seafood restaurant located in Banda Aceh.
restaurants.address: Jl. T. Hamzah Bendahara No. 49 Kuta Alam, Banda Aceh, Aceh

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maimun Saleh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
